name: Slime Adventure (itch) (Mikumabu)
description:
My first entry for a Game Jam (GBJam8)!

Be a cute slime and make your way to the top of the Slime Kingdom!

Controls:

  • Left: Left Arrow
  • Right: Right Arrow
  • Hide: Down Arrow
  • Restart Level: Space

Credits:

  • Music: Dova Syndrome
  • SFX: Nintendo
